Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with a narrow mouth, a straight rim, a neck with straight walls and an unstable convex base. Paste of a reddish colour and surface with yellowish-coloured coating. The upper third of the body presents a painted decoration which is dark reddish in colour: a floral decoration framed by four lines which have been arranged with great precision; two by two, encircling the entire piece.
